name: Scareclaw Straddle
text:
Activate 1 of these effects.
● Target 1 "Scareclaw" monster or "Visas Starfrost" you control and 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; that monster you control gains ATK/DEF equal to that opponent's monster's ATK or DEF (whichever is higher, your choice if tied).
● When a card or effect is activated that targets a "Scareclaw" monster(s) and/or "Visas Starfrost" you control: Negate that effect.
You can only activate 1 "Scareclaw Straddle" per turn.
